languages.text: "Шерин, вы еще с нами?" {n}Джай взволнованно машет аугментированной ладонью перед вашим лицом, затем чуть выдыхает, заметив ваш осознанный взгляд.{/n} "Однажды такая же тварь свела с ума отряд моих ребят. Хорошие парни были, верные. Слава Великому, что оградил вас от подобной участи!"

traits.locale_text: "Шерин, вы еще с нами?" {n}Джай взволнованно машет аугментированной ладонью перед вашим лицом, затем чуть выдыхает, заметив ваш осознанный взгляд.{/n} "Однажды такая же тварь свела с ума отряд моих ребят. Хорошие парни были, верные. Слава Великому, что оградил вас от подобной участи!"

languages.text: "Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"
languages.original_text: "Шерин, вы еще с нами?" {n}Джай взволнованно машет аугментированной ладонью перед вашим лицом, затем чуть выдыхает, заметив ваш осознанный взгляд.{/n} "Однажды такая же тварь свела с ума отряд моих ребят. Хорошие парни были, верные. Слава Великому, что оградил вас от подобной участи!"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"

"Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"

"Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"

"Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"

languages.text: “亲爱的，你还活着吗？”{n}婕伊焦急地在你面前挥舞着她带有植入物的手臂。当她看到你的双眼再次恢复神智时，她长出了一口气。{/n}“有一次，这玩意儿把我的一整队人都搞疯了。那些人都很忠诚，都是好小伙子。感谢至高无上的神皇，让你免遭同样的命运！”
languages.original_text: "Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，你还活着吗？”{n}婕伊焦急地在你面前挥舞着她带有植入物的手臂。当她看到你的双眼再次恢复神智时，她长出了一口气。{/n}“有一次，这玩意儿把我的一整队人都搞疯了。那些人都很忠诚，都是好小伙子。感谢至高无上的神皇，让你免遭同样的命运！”

languages.text: «Shereen, ¿sigue con nosotros?». {n}Jae, nerviosa, agita su mano aumentada delante de tu cara y deja escapar un suspiro cuando ve que tu mirada vuelve a centrarse.{/n} «Una de esas cosas volvió loco a todo mi escuadrón. Y eran buenos muchachos, leales. ¡Gracias al Exaltado por protegerte de ese mismo destino!».
languages.original_text: "Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"

traits.locale_text: «Shereen, ¿sigue con nosotros?». {n}Jae, nerviosa, agita su mano aumentada delante de tu cara y deja escapar un suspiro cuando ve que tu mirada vuelve a centrarse.{/n} «Una de esas cosas volvió loco a todo mi escuadrón. Y eran buenos muchachos, leales. ¡Gracias al Exaltado por protegerte de ese mismo destino!».

languages.text: 「シャリーン、まだ正気かい？」{n}ジェイは心配そうにオーグメントの手をあなたの顔の前で振っている。あなたの瞳に生気が戻ったのを確認して、ジェイは息を吐く。{/n}「こんなヤツにあたしの仲間をおかしくされちまったことがあったんだ。善良で誠実なヤツらだった。エグザルテッド・ワンのおかげであたしは同じ運命をたどらずに済んだけどね！」
languages.original_text: "Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、まだ正気かい？」{n}ジェイは心配そうにオーグメントの手をあなたの顔の前で振っている。あなたの瞳に生気が戻ったのを確認して、ジェイは息を吐く。{/n}「こんなヤツにあたしの仲間をおかしくされちまったことがあったんだ。善良で誠実なヤツらだった。エグザルテッド・ワンのおかげであたしは同じ運命をたどらずに済んだけどね！」

languages.text: « Shereen, vous êtes toujours avec nous ? » {n}Jae agite nerveusement sa main augmentée devant votre visage, puis laisse échapper un soupir de soulagement en voyant la conscience revenir dans vos yeux.{/n} « L'une de ces créatures a fait sombrer une de mes équipes dans la folie, un jour. De bons gars, en plus, très fidèles. Heureusement que l'Exalté vous a épargné ce sort ! »
languages.original_text: "Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"

traits.locale_text: « Shereen, vous êtes toujours avec nous ? » {n}Jae agite nerveusement sa main augmentée devant votre visage, puis laisse échapper un soupir de soulagement en voyant la conscience revenir dans vos yeux.{/n} « L'une de ces créatures a fait sombrer une de mes équipes dans la folie, un jour. De bons gars, en plus, très fidèles. Heureusement que l'Exalté vous a épargné ce sort ! »

languages.text: "Shereen, seid Ihr noch bei uns?" {n}Jae wedelt nervös mit ihrer augmentierten Hand vor deinem Gesicht und atmet dann erleichtert aus, als sie in deinen Augen erkennt, dass dein Bewusstsein zurückkehrt.{/n} "Eins von diesen Dingern hat mal einen ganzen Trupp meiner Leute wahnsinnig gemacht. Es waren gute und loyale Leute. Dem Erhabenen sei Dank, dass er Euch vor demselben Schicksal bewahrt hat!"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, seid Ihr noch bei uns?" {n}Jae wedelt nervös mit ihrer augmentierten Hand vor deinem Gesicht und atmet dann erleichtert aus, als sie in deinen Augen erkennt, dass dein Bewusstsein zurückkehrt.{/n} "Eins von diesen Dingern hat mal einen ganzen Trupp meiner Leute wahnsinnig gemacht. Es waren gute und loyale Leute. Dem Erhabenen sei Dank, dass er Euch vor demselben Schicksal bewahrt hat!"

languages.text: "Bizimle misin şirinim?" {n}Jae, ogmentli elini suratının dibinde endişeyle sallayıp kendine geldiğini fark edince rahat bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Bunlardan biri, bir zamanlar koca bir manga adamımı delirtmişti. Çok da iyi çocuklardı, işlerine sadıklardı. Görkemli'ye şükürler olsun ki onlarla aynı kaderi paylaşmadın!"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, are you still with us?" {n}Jae anxiously waves her augmented hand in front of your face, then lets out a breath when she sees the awareness return to your eyes.{/n} "One of those things turned a whole squad of my guys mad once. Good lads they were too, loyal. Thanks be to the Exalted One for protecting you from the same fate!"

traits.locale_text: "Bizimle misin şirinim?" {n}Jae, ogmentli elini suratının dibinde endişeyle sallıyor ve kendine geldiğini fark edince rahat bir nefes alıyor.{/n} "Bunlardan biri, bir zamanlar adamlarımdan oluşan koca bir mangayı delirtmişti. Çok da iyi çocuklardı, işlerine sadıklardı. Görkemli'ye şükürler olsun ki sen onlarla aynı kaderi paylaşmadın!"
